actions.msg: Pop: Zefr arrives from Manaharr, travelling quickly. She stops the fight, claiming to have a solution to the darkness.

Convo: Hero/Oddleif/Zefr. In a brief but tense moment, Hero takes stock of their clansmen. This scene is especially important if Oddleif takes command due to Rook/Alette’s death. Zefr recruits them to carve a path and set up Menders on the wall.

Convo: Hero, Fasolt, Hakon, Scathach. The dredge are held at bay temporarily all along the wall, bodies are piling up in the holes of the walls like caulking. Fasolt makes his case against the player, may influence Hakon’s alliance.
Chat: Oddleif? How is she holding up?
Convo: Hero, Rugga (in prison). Rugga insists on playing chess while talking, reveals that is everything is going according to his plans.

Convo: Hero, Oddleif, Rugga (in prison). Hero admonishes Rugga for letting the king die. Rugga tells Hero they should have come sooner if they wanted an antidote, or discovers that there never was a cure if they come after the King’s death.
unset this first so the gating wont trigger
Pop5a: (if the party succeeds): the caravan races up the tower. It will take several days. Cut to Arberrang for the last time.
CUTSCENE: Arberrang survived! It's floating in space!
CUTSCENE: The survivors stand on the ruined wall of Arberrang, looking out into the shattered wreckage that remains, but alive.
CUTSCENE: Arberrang is ruined, but the darkness is dispelled. Only a tattered banner remains.
CUTSCENE: Arberrang is a wreck, but the darkness is dispelled. Twisted black shapes litter the ground, but things appear to be peaceful.
CUTSCENE: The survivors stand on the battered walls of Arberrang, looking across a scorched, but intact land.
CUTSCENE: Arberrang is ruined, but the darkness is dispelled. Only a tattered banner remains. Nobody is left to remember Hero’s deeds (no Rook/Alette reunion).
CUTSCENE: Arberrang, covered in darkness. A light bubble surrounds only the great hall, possible survivors?
CUTSCENE: Great hall interior, panning across a tattered banner spread out on the ground. Iver, Juno and remaining Ravens stand in the hall. There are no other survivors.

CUTSCENE: Eyvind becomes indecisive and conflicted, refusing everyone’s suggestion. He panics, and attacks the Serpent, attempting to kill it. He loses control and blows up the Serpent, the tower and himself in the process. Juno revives yet again, alone. The darkness remains and Arberrang is doomed. Both Arberrang and Raven caravans die.
CUTSCENE: Arberrang, covered in darkness. No signs of life. Juno stands alone in the foreground, a ruined banner fluttering nearby. Nobody is left to remember Hero’s deeds (no Rook/Alette reunion).
CUTSCENE: Arberrang is a wreck, but the darkness is dispelled. Twisted black shapes litter the ground, but things appear to be peaceful.
CUTSCENE: The survivors stand on the battered walls of Arberrang, looking across a scorched, but intact land.
CUTSCENE: Arberrang is ruined, but the darkness is dispelled. Only a tattered banner remains.
